abstract: Deep learning architectures for supervised learning on tabular data range from simple multilayer perceptrons (MLP) to sophisticated Transformers and retrieval- augmented methods. This study highlights a major, yet so far overlooked opportunity …

abstract: Learning representations of single-cell genomics data is challenging due to the non- linear and often multi-modal nature of the data on one hand and the need for interpretable representations on the other hand. Existing approaches tend to either …
